title: Queues and protests ....
body_lines: People are queued up to buy diesel and kerosene  around the filling sheds in and around Colombo, as the country is faced with severe scarcity of fuel, cooking gas etc., In spite of all these crisis, people are also seen protesting vehemently against the government for its failure to take  appropriate action to control the present economic crisis and demanding the rulers to step down. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
